divs: Sighting Detailsi was in queens ny at my aunts house having a cook out. through out the day and evening you can see planes flying over the the city towards my aunts backyard. i grew up around military bases all my life so i know commercial planes, helicopters etc. but all of the sudden that evening everyone at the party seen a funny blue glowing light 12 to 15 witnesses. children 8 yrs old to adults 80. it moved very slow in a sideways zigzag movement then stopped. split into 3 spots in a triangler formation. then became one again and continued toward us in the same movement. Peoples cell phones where acting funny not allowing footage. until the last say 20 sec. it was there for about 4 mins...i also have about 15 sec of footage
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around July 21st 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: blue light moving in circle motion that transformed into a triangler formation with 3 lights ..i have about 15 sec. of footage. but my phone was acting funny at first not allowing me to take footage
